body.p:
anant recently proposed moving to a Gentoo Monthly Newsletter, giving us more time to prepare high-quality articles and go through a proper draft and review process. The extra time allows us to prepare statistics, aggregate interesting content from Planet Gentoo and generally come up with top-notch content, such as features on the Developer of the Month. This happened as there were not enough volunteers to help with content for a weekly newsletter. Suggestions for other items the community wants to read are warmly welcomed; please e-mail us.
We encourage any users who aspire to Public Relations work to get in touch and help with this effort.
